channel.title: My Server.?
channel.description:
I have developed/created a custom weapon maker minigame. it works like this: You vote and get 1 point: you use the point on a fillout page ingame like so:
Strength:+ Attack:+ Defense:+ 1Handed:T/F 2:Handed:T/F
and when you click on it it takes away one of ur points and makes the item, it costs 1 point for ever +10 str atk defense and what not. you can come back and re edit your weapon for 5 vote points. i thought it was a pretty good idea.... but its got some glitches... pictures will be posted soon

item.title: My Server.?
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

I have developed/created a custom weapon maker minigame.
it works like this:
You vote and get 1 point:
you use the point on a fillout page ingame like so:

Strength:+
Attack:+
Defense:+
1Handed:T/F
2:Handed:T/F

and when you click on it it takes away one of ur points and makes the item, it costs 1 point for ever +10 str atk defense and what not.
you can come back and re edit your weapon for 5 vote points.
i thought it was a pretty good idea… but its got some glitches… pictures will be posted soon
